title: Q3 - Do small businesses and start-ups also need to comply, or only big companies?
description: The Digital Personal Data Protection Act, 2023 (DPDPA) applies to all organizations — large corporations, small businesses, and start-ups — that process personal data within India or offer goods and services to individuals in India.

previous.title: Q2 - What steps should a company take first to begin compliance?
